cause.description:
The Lebanese repetitive wars led to considerable numbers of martyrs... Victims of the war left behind them blood, tears and hopes... The families of the war victims are today suffering from scarcity of means available to them in order to survive the harsh financial conditions that are surrounding them... A small contribution creates big smiles on sad faces...
1. Young Orphans whose parents were victims of the Lebanese War should be helped
2. Nutrition and health care are basic rights for every human being
3. Start-up help to build a sustainable and pleasant future for the Lebanese Society
cause.mission: Help Poor Orphans, victims of the war in Lebanon
cause.name: Auxilia: Help the Orphans of Lebanon
